answers.answer: I reviewed our prior communication and recalled there was a ring enhancing lesion probably in the right part of the brain which has probably caused your left sided symptoms. It is quite possible that the fluctuation could be due to the resolving lesion. Another possiblity would be seizures, but less likely. In some patients with brain/cord lesions that cause tone problems, the symptoms can sometimes get worse with fatigue or stress. As long as you are continuing to improve and are being closely followed by ?six neurologists, you should be ok. GOod luck
